about_the_game: In "Operation Dawn," players step into the shoes of a determined mother who recently lost her son, brutally killed in a tragic event at his military base. In the wake of this devastating loss, her husband is kidnapped by a ruthless terrorist group. Driven by love and a thirst for justice, she joins a secret organization dedicated to taking down these terrorists and rescuing her husband. Set in a vast open world filled with dynamic NPCs and customizable vehicles, players will navigate through treacherous environments, gather intelligence, and engage in high-stakes missions as part of the covert Operation Dawn.
detailed_description: In "Operation Dawn," players step into the shoes of a determined mother who recently lost her son, brutally killed in a tragic event at his military base. In the wake of this devastating loss, her husband is kidnapped by a ruthless terrorist group. Driven by love and a thirst for justice, she joins a secret organization dedicated to taking down these terrorists and rescuing her husband. Set in a vast open world filled with dynamic NPCs and customizable vehicles, players will navigate through treacherous environments, gather intelligence, and engage in high-stakes missions as part of the covert Operation Dawn.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: i5 10th gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 19 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is currently in Beta for ALL players

Recommended:

  • Processor: i5 10th gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 super
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

pegi.descriptors: World War 1 is designed for players aged 13 and above. The game features strategic gameplay, intense battles, and a complex storyline that may be more suitable for older teenagers and adults. Additionally, the game's themes of war, conflict, and strategic decision-making may be better understood and appreciated by players in this age range. However, parental guidance is always advised, and individual maturity levels should be considered when determining if the game is appropriate for a player.

short_description: In "Operation Dawn," you play as a mother who recently lost her son. Now, with her husband kidnapped by terrorists, she joins a secret organization to rescue him. Navigate an open world with dynamic NPCs and cars, and embark on high-stakes missions in the covert Operation Dawn.
